title: Ezro Watch Face
description: A Simple Minimalistic Watch FaceIts as easy as that, from a personal point of view i couldn't find a watch face for my needs that was also asthetically pleasing so i decided to create my own.*Displays basic time/date *Displays Battery percent of the watch*Customisable colours- Should work on all android wear *(Note: Tested on ASUS Zen Watch, i havent tested all wearables)
descriptionHTML:
A Simple Minimalistic Watch Face

Its as easy as that, from a personal point of view i couldn't find a watch face for my needs that was also asthetically pleasing so i decided to create my own.

*Displays basic time/date
*Displays Battery percent of the watch

*Customisable colours

- Should work on all android wear *(Note: Tested on ASUS Zen Watch, i havent tested all wearables)
comments: Alignment problems on the Huawei Watch. I send screenshot via email
recentChanges: *BUG FIX: Fixed battery percentage not aligning properly on higher resolution devices
*Updated the Mobile Interface to be more interactive and attractive
*Implemented a new Colour Picker for enhanced customization
*Styled watch face slight including an arc and battery info larger
